Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 提供一個實作您自己的執行緒集區的機制，以執行工作流程和管理記憶體計時器登錄與事件。

span.span: Provides a mechanism to implement your own thread pool to execute the workflow and manage in-memory timer registration and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 所有會建立執行緒以執行工作流程執行階段引擎主機上之工作流程執行個體的類別，都是以 做為基底類別 (Base Class)。 is that base class for all classes that create threads that run workflow instances on the workflow runtime engine host. 這些結構包括 及 。These include and .

para.span: 當您繼承自 時，必須覆寫下列成員：、 和 。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the following members: , and .

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何建立 物件 (繼承自 ) 的執行個體，並將它加入至執行階段。The following example demonstrates creating an instance of a object (that inherits from ) and adding it to the runtime. 這個範例來自 Program.cs 檔中的＜巢狀例外處理常式 SDK＞範例。This example is from the Nested Exception Handlers SDK sample, from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 巢狀例外狀況處理常式範例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1da0209-842b-41c8-9b7c-0cbaa1034265)。For more information, see [Nested Exception Handlers Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1da0209-842b-41c8-9b7c-0cbaa1034265). remarks.format: ## Remarks 會從暫止的工作項目佇列中移除之前的排程工作流程執行個體要求。 removes from the pending work items queue a previous request to schedule a workflow instance.

summary.span: 由執行階段呼叫以要求新的執行緒執行工作流程執行個體。

span.span: Called by the runtime to request a new thread to run a workflow instance.

summary.span: 在衍生的類別中覆寫時，執行階段會呼叫此方法以排程特定執行個體 ID 的工作項目 (回呼)。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, this method is called by the runtime to schedule a work item (callback) for a particular instance ID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 建構函式建立委派方法，使其在新的執行緒中執行。Use the constructor to create your delegate method to run in the new thread.

summary.span: 在衍生的類別中覆寫時，執行階段會呼叫此方法以排程要在指定時間 () 完成之特定工作流程執行個體的工作項目。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, this method is called by the runtime to schedule a work item (callback) for a particular workflow instance to be done at the given time ().
